title: THE GOLDEN RECORD: A Testament for Non-Terrestrial Intelligence
tagline: We were unfinished. A bridge between animal and divine. We burned ourselves up trying to cross it.
structure: 5-act chronicle spanning 40,000 years of human civilization

council_of_legends.da_vinci: Fractal structure - each chapter mirrors human biology (chaotic inside, ordered outside)
council_of_legends.dostoevsky: Show the darkness as friction required to create heat of love
council_of_legends.darwin: Materialist reality - meat and bone that defied entropy
council_of_legends.sagan: Frame small bloody struggle against silent cosmos

narrative_thread.family: The Builders - not kings, but ordinary hands that shaped civilization
narrative_thread.perspective: Not boasting. Not apologizing. Just witnessing.
